Until one night, Rere finally tries to steal a book owned by Farhan and Rere succeeds in stealing and exchanging Farhan's book with another.

programme.title: Satu Pancingan 2 Jodoh Baperan
programme.desc: Citra (Nabila Zavira) works as an infotainment journalist, and Jio (Aliando Syarief) is a famous actor. Jio sees his girlfriend cheating and wants to end her life. However, Citra, seeing Jio's suicidal thoughts, comforts him. Citra eventually collaborates with Jio for an exclusive report.

programme.title: BINTANG PANTURA 5 - EP 36
programme.desc: The Pantura Bintang Stage is back looking for Bintang. Excitement, cuteness, rocking each other to become a star.

programme.title: KAMERA CINTA - EP 9
programme.desc: A single woman will date six different men and meet their families. Next, the woman must choose one of the six men to be her boyfriend.

programme.title: ANDAI KU TAHU - EP 6
programme.desc: Andai Ku Tahu is a reality drama program that doesn't focus on a person's punishment in this world for their sins and deeds, but rather on the person's journey to repentance after seeing a vision of the terrible torments of hell. Indeed, the temptations of hell are beautiful, while the path to heaven is so difficult.

programme.title: Memancing Cinta Di Kolam Hati Neng Mawar
programme.desc: Mawar returns to her village to celebrate her career as a makeup artist and wants to buy a huge fishing pond for her father. Meanwhile, Mawar has just revealed to her father that hundreds of millions of rupiah she brought with her were stolen. She accuses Juan of stealing her money. However, it turns out that Juan is the wealthy owner of the fishing pond Mawar wants to buy.

programme.title: DEWI RINDU - EP 56
programme.desc: Dewi is a girl with big dreams. She is determined to become successful and lift her family out of economic hardship. But who would have thought that her beautiful dream would be shattered and she would have to face the bitter reality of being pregnant out of wedlock.

programme.title: Es Kul Kul Varian Orang Lama Pemenangnya
programme.desc: Sisil (Yuriska Patricia), the ice cream seller, confides in Bimo (Masaji Wijayanto) about her evil plan after her cart was confiscated by the public order agency (Satpol PP). Bimo plans to match Sisil with his older brother, Gino, to prevent his parents from agreeing. Intending to bring down his older brother, Bimo instead begins to like Sisil.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 510
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 36
programme.desc: A story of friendship since their school days, Mulia and Satria were inseparable friends as time went by, and seeds of love began to grow between them. Mulia and Satria had to suppress their feelings because they both had girlfriends.

programme.desc: Laras and Jane had to face the reality that their luxury home had been confiscated, and their father had been conned and suddenly bankrupt. Finally, Laras and Jane went to their aunt's hometown in Garut. There, they met Bara, the son of her aunt's friend.

programme.title: Cinta Miss Kambing Makin Kesini, Makin Kesana
programme.desc: Nayla invites Akbar to work on her farm for a month in hopes of securing a contract to supply goat meat for her new restaurant. However, behind what initially seems like a simple task, a captivating love story develops amidst the hustle and bustle of farm life.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 510

programme.title: Kukira Putus Ternyata Love You Terus
programme.desc: Eve (Jennifer Eve) has to deal with an annoying boss. He refuses to accept anything from her if she's late. If Eve is even a minute late, he will scold her. One day, in a fit of rage, Eve insults him for always being single. However, one night, Eve finds him on the roof and mistakenly believes he's trying to kill himself.

programme.title: CINTA MULIA - EP 37

programme.title: Aku Sudah Tak Ayam Lagi
programme.desc: Mita (Yuriska Patricia) was sworn into poverty by Genta (Fendy Chow), a dim sum seller, not long after Mita received news that her father died and left a lot of debt. Mita fell into poverty and had to go to the village to meet her grandfather to learn to manage her father's inheritance, a chicken farm.

programme.title: Lawak Ke Dik? - EP 6
programme.desc: Program untuk kanak-kanak bagi menyuarakan pendapat dan berkongsi buah fikiran mereka secara spontan.

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: Sembang Teh Tarik yang dikendalikan Datuk AC Mizal ia merupakan program 'talk show' yang santai sesuai untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Karoot Komedia - EP 8
programme.desc: Karoot Komedia adalah sebuah rancangan komedi muzikal 30 minit yang menggabungkan muzik, lakonan sketsa dengan topik-topik menarik yang akan dilakonkan secara spontan.

programme.title: Dahlia - EP 31
programme.desc: Dahlia memiliki segalanya, namun semuanya musnah akibat sikap khianat kawan baiknya sendiri yang ingin merampas semua miliknya termasuk suami, anak & harta.

programme.title: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak The Series - EP 26
programme.desc: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak The Series kisah tiga sekawan yang menemui congkak yang usang , Setelah itu, pelbagai kejadian aneh melanda kampung tersebut.

programme.title: Cik Reen Encik Ngok Ngek - EP 11
programme.desc: Azreen dan Harris terpaksa berkahwin apabila adik mereka melarikan diri pada malam sebelum bernikah. Adakah perkahwinan Harris dan Azreen akan berkekalan selepas Roadtrip Misadventures mereka?

programme.title: NoYa - EP 11
programme.desc: Noya bertujuan untuk mengambil semua kegilaan dan ketawa Aya dan Noreen telah diukir dan membawanya ke peringkat seterusnya.

programme.title: Gelap Geli Tak - EP 3
programme.desc: Game show yang di hoskan oleh Faizal Ismail. Peserta bersaing antara satu sama lain dalam pelbagai cabaran, tapi muslihatnya mereka ditempatkan dalam persekitaran gelap gelita.

programme.title: Layan Je Super Spontan - EP 1
programme.desc: Sebiah program menarik untuk seisi keluarga

programme.title: Skrin Komedia: Tuyul Ke London - EP 8
programme.desc: Drama komedi seram tentang sepasang pencuri bertindak menggunakan seekor tuyul untuk mengembangkan jenayah mereka tapi perancangan mereka membawa mereka bertembung dengan pelbagai hantu yang tak disangka.

programme.title: Biniku Ninja - EP 20
programme.desc: Azlan berasal dari keluarga susah yang akhirnya berjaya merantau ke UK setelah mendapat tawaran menyambung ijazah dalam aliran seni. Kisah bermula apabila beliau berjumpa dengan seorang gadis

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Sembang Teh Tarik yang dikendalikan Datuk AC Mizal ia merupakan program 'talk show' yang santai sesuai untuk tontonan semua.

programme.title: Cinta Nikita - EP 7
programme.desc: Laila terkenal di kampungnya berkat vlog yang dimuatnya, sehingga orang di kampung memanggilnya dengan nama Nikita (noNI iKI artis koTA).

programme.title: Chapalrela - EP 12
programme.desc: Anjang Merah kematian ibu dan terpaksa tinggal dengan ibu tirinya, Mak Jenab dan saudara tirinya Jali Puteh. Anjang Merah sentiasa didera juga ditugaskan menjaga kandang kambing ayahnya, Pak Manap.

programme.title: Kail Pagi Makan Petang - EP 8
programme.desc: Program mengisahkan tentang teknik memancing dan ikuti pengembaran mereka untuk mengetahui ikan yang ditangkap dan masakan menarik yang akan disediakan.

programme.title: Seminggu Sekali - EP 22
programme.desc: Bersama Douglas Lim & Adibah Noor, saksikan mereka mengupas dan menyampaikan isu semasa kepada masyarakat secara santai dan lucu.

programme.title: Karoot Komedia - EP 9
programme.desc: Karoot Komedia adalah sebuah rancangan komedi muzikal 30 minit yang menggabungkan muzik, lakonan sketsa dengan topik-topik menarik yang akan dilakonkan secara spontan.

programme.title: Tabung Lawak S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: Tabung Lawak ialah pelbagai klip video pendek untuk menekankan topik-topik hangat dalam cara yang lucu.

programme.title: Dahlia - EP 32
programme.desc: Dahlia memiliki segalanya, namun semuanya musnah akibat sikap khianat kawan baiknya sendiri yang ingin merampas semua miliknya termasuk suami, anak & harta.

programme.title: Abang Tinted & Handbag Ajaib
programme.desc: Kisah seorang lelaki yang kehilangan segalanya selepas ditipu rakan niaganya, tapi diselamatkan oleh tas tangan ajaib yang mempunyai jalan penyelesaian kepada semua masalah.

programme.title: Buana Oh Buana - EP 2
programme.desc: Sitcom komedi yang berkisahkan kehidupan masyarakat yang tinggal di kampung dan bandar dengan isu-isu yang berbangkit lakonan Ajak, Yassin dan Shuib

programme.title: Gelap Geli Tak - EP 4
programme.desc: Game show yang di hoskan oleh Faizal Ismail. Peserta bersaing antara satu sama lain dalam pelbagai cabaran, tapi muslihatnya mereka ditempatkan dalam persekitaran gelap gelita.

programme.title: Joras & Stars - EP 1

programme.title: Kail Pagi Makan Petang - EP 7
programme.desc: Program mengisahkan tentang teknik memancing dan ikuti pengembaran mereka untuk mengetahui ikan yang ditangkap dan masakan menarik yang akan disediakan.

programme.title: Cik Ayu Mee Sanggul - EP 2
programme.desc: Ayu janda muda yang selalu memakai kebaya tradisional. Dia mengahwini seorang lelaki bernama Akhtar tanpa ikatan cinta agar dapat menjadi ibu kepada anak duda yang ada penyakit Major Thalassemia.

programme.title: Maharaja Lawak Mega 2013 - EP 12
programme.desc: Maharaja Lawak Mega kembali dengan penyertaan para pelawak terbaik di rantau ini merangkumi tiga negara Malaysia, Singapura dan Indonesia.

programme.title: Jangan Buat Hal - EP 8
programme.desc: Saksikan gelagat Nana Mahazan bersama selebriti popular melatah sambil bermain permainan menarik dan kumpulan manakah yang digelar juara bagi setiap episod.

programme.title: Life At Thinker - EP 16
programme.desc: Life At Thinker adalah sebuah program vlog atau diari yang memaparkan aktiviti-aktiviti menarik dan kegilaan krew-krew Thinker Studios di sepanjang minggu.

programme.title: Karoot Komedia X SR2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan komedi muzikal yang menggabungkan muzik, lakonan & sketsa dengan topik-topik menarik yang akan dilakonkan secara spontan oleh pelawak terkenal Malaysia.

programme.title: Betul Ke Bohong ? - EP 7
programme.desc: Panel selebriti memilih jawapan berdasarkan kenyataan dan cerita yang mungkin benar atau tidak, 2 kumpulan berentap untuk perolehi markah tertinggi.

programme.title: Opocot Melatah Budak Pejabat - EP 7

programme.title: Spontan Boboi & Kengkawan - EP 2

programme.desc: Lydia dan Rudy telah pun berkahwin. Lydia nak anak walaupun Rudy belum bersedia lagi. Perangai Lydia makin menjadi- jadi apabila mengikut hukum hakam dari kakiberamal.com.

programme.title: Buana Oh Buana - EP 3
programme.desc: Sitcom komedi yang berkisahkan kehidupan masyarakat yang tinggal di kampung dan bandar dengan isu-isu yang berbangkit lakonan Ajak, Yassin dan Shuib

programme.title: Gelap Geli Tak - EP 5
programme.desc: Game show yang di hoskan oleh Faizal Ismail. Peserta bersaing antara satu sama lain dalam pelbagai cabaran, tapi muslihatnya mereka ditempatkan dalam persekitaran gelap gelita.

programme.title: Joras & Stars - EP 2
programme.desc: Joras & Stars ialah sketsa bersama artis jemputan setiap minggu untuk menghiburkan penonton melalui sketsa yang kelakar.

programme.title: Kail Pagi Makan Petang - EP 8
programme.desc: Program mengisahkan tentang teknik memancing dan ikuti pengembaran mereka untuk mengetahui ikan yang ditangkap dan masakan menarik yang akan disediakan.

programme.title: Cik Ayu Mee Sanggul - EP 3
programme.desc: Ayu janda muda yang selalu memakai kebaya tradisional. Dia mengahwini seorang lelaki bernama Akhtar tanpa ikatan cinta agar dapat menjadi ibu kepada anak duda yang ada penyakit Major Thalassemia.

programme.title: Maharaja Lawak Mega 2013 - EP 13
programme.desc: Maharaja Lawak Mega kembali dengan penyertaan para pelawak terbaik di rantau ini merangkumi tiga negara Malaysia, Singapura dan Indonesia.

programme.title: Life At Thinker - EP 17
programme.desc: Life At Thinker adalah sebuah program vlog atau diari yang memaparkan aktiviti-aktiviti menarik dan kegilaan krew-krew Thinker Studios di sepanjang minggu.

programme.title: Karoot Komedia X SR2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan komedi muzikal yang menggabungkan muzik, lakonan & sketsa dengan topik-topik menarik yang akan dilakonkan secara spontan oleh pelawak terkenal Malaysia.

programme.title: Betul Ke Bohong ? - EP 8
programme.desc: Panel selebriti memilih jawapan berdasarkan kenyataan dan cerita yang mungkin benar atau tidak, 2 kumpulan berentap untuk perolehi markah tertinggi.

programme.title: Sukan Pejabat - EP 12
programme.desc: Sebuah sitcom game show yang paling tidak adil di dunia dan memang tidak akan adil seperti realiti kehidupan di pejabat andamungkin?

programme.title: Frust Gila - EP 3
programme.desc: Frust Gila rancangan permainan penuh cabaran untuk 3 peserta, cabaran di sediakan untuk mendapatkan hanya satu pemenang.

programme.title: Tapao - EP 2
programme.desc: Kembara mencari makan menyajikan keindahan visual. Tapi bagaimana jika hidangan itu dibungkus? Adakah sama enak di meja restoran? Kena dengan namanya, Tapao mencari jawapan di sebalik persoalan ini.

programme.title: Komediri - EP 5
programme.desc: Sebuah rancangan 'Stand Up Comedy' yang mempersembahkan 3 pelawak dan di hoskan oleh Harith Iskander.

programme.title: Oh My Bapak - EP 3
programme.desc: Mampukah selebriti yang bergelar bapa menjaga anak-anak mereka seorang diri tanpa bantuan isteri dan bagaimana kesudahan cabaran yang mereka tempuhi?

programme.title: My Sweet RT - EP 6
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang wanita bernama Mona. Dia adalah wanita yang suka motosikal, dan juga suka bertengkar, jadi dia digelar wanita yang kuat.

programme.title: Isteri Halal - EP 66
programme.desc: Eyra menyesal diatas perbuatannya terhadap Noor. Adellia keliru apabila Zayn mengatakan yang dia tahu perancangan Adellia untuk pindah ke United Kingdom. Zayn terjumpa sesuatu yang mengejutkan.

programme.title: Naluri Hati - EP 23
programme.desc: Pada hari perkahwinannya, Dinda teragak-agak kerana dia akan berkahwin dengan orang yang tidak dicintainya. Namun, satu kejadian berlaku dan menyebabkan Dinda mengalami amnesia separa.

programme.title: RASA Projek Gerenti Jadi - EP 7
programme.desc: Majalah masakan di Malaysia kini di kaca televisyen anda memaparkan resepi - resepi menarik setiap minggu yang dihoskan oleh Norzaini Abdul Halim (Aunty Aini) bersama - sama Adam Mahamed Ismail.

programme.title: The House: Ezurin Khyra - EP 6
programme.desc: The House menampilkan Ezurin Khyra yang sering menjadi sorotan kerana imej glamornya. Program ini juga menayangkan keperibadian ibu kepada lima orang cahaya mata ini yang tidak diketahui umum.

programme.title: Aku Bukan BIMBO - EP 1
programme.desc: Elsuraya percaya Azad adalah punca kematian ibu bapanya dalam satu kemalangan dan membenci lelaki itu yang dalam diam mencintainya. Perkara sebenar disimpan rapi oleh Azad dan sahabat baiknya, Dani Ikram.

programme.title: Geng Mak-Mak - EP 1
programme.desc: Geng Mak Mak menceritakan kisah seorang bakal ibu, Dahlia yang cuba belajar untuk menjadi seorang ibu yang terbaik untuk anaknya daripada 4 orang sahabat yang juga bergelar ibu.

programme.title: 3 Campur 2 - EP 11
programme.desc: Kisah sebuah keluarga yang mempunyai lima adik beradik tiri. Ayahnya mempunyai tiga orang anak dan isteri baru mempunyai dua orang anak yang nakal. Timbul pelbagai konflik dan komedi dalam cerita ini.

programme.title: Keluarga Iskandar S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Seorang ibu yang tegas dan penyayang bernama Mak Jah yang berusaha sedapa upaya untuk menyatukan anak-anak, menantu dan cucu-cucunya yang dilanda perpecahan.

programme.title: Indonesian Street Food - EP 9
programme.desc: Separa dokumentari yang meneroka tentang masakan makanan jalanan di seluruh Indonesia

programme.title: Angin Cinta

programme.title: Mini Me Bakes - EP 5

programme.title: Strawberi Karipap The Series - EP 7

programme.desc: Maragatham holds her step-daughter Punitha dear, to the point of being overbearing. However, their bond turns twisted & burdened when Punitha finds her soulmate, Kabilan. Amidst family betrayals, can Punitha show her mother the true meaning of love?

programme.title: MANAMAGALE VAA
programme.desc: Narmada's mission to her ancestral village to reunite her father & his estranged family entwines with Kathir's task of finding suitable grooms for his three sisters. What unfolds when they fall in love, striving for a cause against the same enemy?

programme.title: VINODHINI

programme.title: PUTHU VASANTHAM

programme.desc: In 1971, Quebec became a figurehead in the field of forensic psychiatry, notably with the creation of the Philippe-Pinel Institute. Its aim? The treatment and social reintegration of prisoners whose mental health acted against them.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Les Chefs! - EP 7
programme.desc: The remaining competitors must create a dish using a selection of unpopular ingredients in Quebec. Along the way, a surprise announcement shakes up all their plans.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Le Mystere De La Chambre Jaune
programme.desc: Following the attempted murder of Mathilde, daughter of the Professor Strangerson, the young reporter Rouletabille head for chateau du Glandier to clear up the mystery. Who is the murderer? What is his motive? And above all how did he escape from a yellow bedroom which was locked from the inside?

programme.title: Jeux D'influence - EP 7
programme.desc: Anything goes when it comes to trying to stop Delpierre's parliamentary bill from progressing. Romain's murky past is used against him. Chloe is sectioned and held against her will in a specialist clinic for her so-called addiction. Claire is in danger and turns to Romain for help.

programme.title: Jeux D'influence - EP 8
programme.desc: Romain tells Delpierre he is resigning. Despite everything the latter is determined to make a major modification to his amendment in order to protect it. Bowman obliges Claire to sign a termination of contract together with a non-disclosure clause. The battle seems all but lost...

programme.title: Un Chateau En Cadeau
programme.desc: Andre Manoukian invites his friend Bruno Solo for an extraordinary Christmas in the Chateau de Chenonceau. The pair share the magic of the festive season with a host of other guests on this uniquely enchanting journey.

programme.title: Les Petits Meurtres D'agatha Christie
programme.desc: The presenter of the programme ''Aux Frontieres du Cosmos'' is found murdered, in mysterious circumstances. With an investigation that seems totally surreal, Greco needs to keep a cool head, particularly when Beretta falls under the charm of the astrophysicist sent to lend a hand, and starts believing in flying saucers.

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires

programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 30
programme.desc: Every day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box on the set. But what does it contain? It's always a surprising object that leads them to discover very different subjects: turtles, bowling or even cloud formation.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus - EP 33
programme.desc: Four little dinosaurs, Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu, discover a dangerous world where the mysterious Gigantosaurus, the most ferocious of all the dinosaurs, is forever on the prowl. The four best friends set their heading for adventure, confronting their fears and working together to solve all their problems.

programme.title: Yetili - EP 46
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Les Quiquoi - EP 11
programme.desc: Olive, Petole, Boulard, Mixo, Raoul and Pamela make up a full-of-fun gang known as the Quiquoi. Together they ask a host of existential questions, using drawings to find the answers. In their own quirky way, they love nothing better than creating surrealist worlds where everything becomes possible.

programme.title: PL GOATS - EP 1

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 30
programme.desc: Three decades on from Manchester United's iconic Class of '92, PL Stories steps beyond the headline names to rediscover the teammates who shared the same dressing room, dreams, and demands of one of football's most revered youth systems. We sit down with the lesser-known graduates who lived that journey first-hand, players whose paths diverged from the global spotlight but whose experiences offer a rare and revealing window into the reality behind the legend.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 9
programme.desc: Having risen from the bustling streets of Nigeria to the pinnacle of professional football in England, Mikel John Obi's story is a remarkable one that's seen him win 2 Premier League titles, 4 FA Cups, 2 European trophies and 3 Africa Cup of Nations titles. This week on The Big Interview, the former Chelsea man opens up on the challenges of fame and fortune and lifts the lid on each of the managers he worked with at Chelsea.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 17
programme.desc: Few players have left a legacy in the Premier League quite like Gianfranco Zola. A magician on the pitch, with a personality that made him loved off it too. Revered at Chelsea, his number 25 wasn't worn for another 20 years after he left the club after he helped the Blues to two FA Cup triumphs and UEFA Super Cup and Cup Winners Cup success.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW - EP 13
programme.desc: Since joining Crystal Palace in 2021 from Mainz, Jean-Phillipe Mateta has gone on to make over 100 appearances for the Eagles and has established himself as a key figure in Oliver Glasner's side. Leading the line in both of their recent FA Cup and Community Shield triumphs, Mateta also won Silver at the 2024 Olympic Games with France.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (GB: SALAH)
programme.desc: From free-kicks to solo runs, scissor kicks to 30-yard screamers, Goals of the Season revisits some of the most memorable strikes from the 24/25 campaign, whilst paying homage to the Golden Boot winner.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Wolverhampton Wanderers (MW18) - EP 176
programme.desc: Liverpool have won 16 of their last 17 Premier League games against Wolves, with the exception being a 3-0 loss at Molineux in February 2023.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Brighton and Hove Albion (MW18) - EP 173
programme.desc: Arsenal have won just three of their eight Premier League home games against Brighton (38%, D2 L3), only having a lower win rate against Wimbledon (25%) and Liverpool (36%) among sides theyve faced 5+ times.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Aston Villa (MW19) (Live) - EP 185
programme.desc: Aston Villa are unbeaten in their last two away league games against Arsenal, beating them 2-0 in April 2024 and drawing 2-2 in January last season. They last had a longer run without defeat the Emirates between 2006-07 and 2008-09 (3).

programme.title: West Ham United vs Brighton and Hove Albion (MW19) - EP 184
programme.desc: The 34th season of the Premier League sees Liverpool defend its title against a host of teams keen for glory themselves. 20 teams are in the mix but only 1 champion will emerge ultimately.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Wolverhampton Wanderers (MW19) (Live) - EP 186
programme.desc: Manchester United kept just their second Premier League clean sheet of the season against Newcastle last time out. They last recorded a shutout in consecutive league games in September 2024 under Erik ten Hag (vs Southampton and Crystal Palace).

programme.title: Burnley vs Newcastle United (MW19) (Live) - EP 181
programme.desc: Burnley have scored exactly once in all seven of their Premier League home games against Newcastle, though theyve lost each of the last three since a 1-0 victory in December 2019.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Everton (MW19) (Live) - EP 183
programme.desc: Since returning to the Premier League in 2022-23, Nottingham Forest have won just one of their seven matches against Everton (D2 L4), a 2-0 away win in December 2024.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Brighton and Hove Albion (MW19) (Live) - EP 184
programme.desc: West Ham have won none of their eight Premier League home games against Brighton (D6 L2) - only Burnley have ever faced an opponent more at home without ever winning in the competition (10 vs Arsenal, 10 vs Chelsea).

programme.title: Chelsea vs Bournemouth (MW19) (Live) - EP 182
programme.desc: Bournemouth are winless in their last eight Premier League matches against Chelsea (D4 L4), with the last two ending as draws - only two of the first 15 meetings between the teams had been drawn.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA JP Buys vs. Luthando Biko
programme.desc: This episode features a Bantamweight championship bout as current champion JP Buys faces off against interm champion Luthando Biko. Bonus coverage includes Shaun De Lange vs. Marcel Teniers and Wade Kerspuy vs. Josemar Octavio.

programme.title: WCCB Osleys Iglesias vs. Vladimir Shishkin
programme.desc: From the Montreal Casino in Canada, the undefeated IBO Super Middleweight Champion, Osleys Iglesias, looks to defend his title against top-ranked Vladimir Shishkin. The bout will also determine the mandatory challenger for the IBF World Championship in the division, currently held by Canelo Alvarez. Both fighters are ranked inside the top 5 according to several world rankings, with Iglesias ranked #3 and Shishkin #2 in the world by the IBF.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Bernard Hopkins vs. Jean Pascal
programme.desc: This episode features Bernard Hopkins taking on Jean Pascal in a light heavyweight title bout, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts
programme.desc: Featuring Women's CMX Form and Weapons and Girl's Weapons at the ISKA US Open from Disney, Orlando, Florida, USA.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Sergio Martinez vs. Darren Barker
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a middleweight title fight between champion Sergio Martinez and up-and-coming European middleweight Darren Baker that ends with a right hook blast. Also on the card, action from 5-time champion Timothy Bradley.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 4 featuring Goeido, Abi, Kisenosato and Tochinoshin from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.desc: Episode 11: Bangkok, Thailand - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Muay Thai and Martial Art of Punches, Kicks, Elbows and Knees with Masters Thakoon Pongsupha and Karim Pattana.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 11: Bangkok, Thailand - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Muay Thai and Martial Art of Punches, Kicks, Elbows and Knees with Masters Thakoon Pongsupha and Karim Pattana.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA JP Buys vs. Luthando Biko
programme.desc: This episode features a Bantamweight championship bout as current champion JP Buys faces off against interm champion Luthando Biko. Bonus coverage includes Shaun De Lange vs. Marcel Teniers and Wade Kerspuy vs. Josemar Octavio.

programme.title: WCCB Sara Bailey vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: LIVE September 21st from the Hard Rock Casino in Ottawa, Canada, undefeated WBA Light Flyweight World Champion Sara Bailey of Ontario and IBF/WBO Light Flyweight World Champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina meet to unify the titles. Bailey claimed her title in just her fourth professional fight defeating Guadalupe Bautista, and Bermudez became a two-time champion when beating Tania Enriquez before two successful defenses.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best Judo from the Tashkent Grand Prix, we speak with one of Israel's fighters Sagi Muki about the importance of positivity in the face of adversity, and we stop to get to know Dzmitry Minkou, a young talent in the world of Judo.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Andre Berto vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features The Ring Magazine's 2011 Fight of The Year from the Foxwoods Resort in Mashantucket, Connecticut, USA. Undefeated welterweight world champion Andre Berto (27-0, 21 KOs) puts his title on the line against 'Vicious' Victor Ortiz (28-2, 22 KOs) in a fight that restores your passion in the sport of boxing.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Roberto Duran vs. Sean Fitzgerald
programme.desc: One of the greatest fighters of all time, Boxing Hall of Famer Roberto Duran, continues his comeback against Worcester, Massachusetts native Sean Fitzgerald. Duran would enter the bout coming off three straight victories, looking to continue his run towards another shot at a world championship. He would get more than he bargained for against the young undefeated Fitzgerald, who gave Duran a more competitive fight than anyone could have expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather vs. Juan Manuel Marquez
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Floyd Mayweather's return to boxing after a 21-month retirement. He takes on Juan Manuel Marquez in a fight that saw 1 million pay-per-view buys for a revenue of $52 million. Also on the card, action from a young Sergey Kovalev.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Kagayaki, Kaisei, Ichinojo and Goeido from the Nagoya basho, 2018.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this special one hour episode, we see the best of the World Judo Championships from Budapest where everyone in the world swarms to witness the crowning of 14 world champions. Also, world renowned fighter Teddy Riner experiences his hardest title defense in his career.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 66
programme.desc: The Teletubbies are about to go on the Tubby Custard Ride with the hat, bag, ball and scooter when they realise there is not enough room. The Noo-Noo looks after their things.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S7) - EP 6
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'f', and we go on an adventure around the sound. We make some funny faces, see some fish and follow a fast fire engine!

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 41
programme.desc: Zip and the friends are going on a fairy tale scavenger hunt. But when Zip becomes unsure about the clues, will the friends still get their magical fairy tale prize?

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S2) - EP 8
programme.desc: When a little turtle gets stranded on the beach in OKIDO, Messy helps her rejoin her friends so they can begin their journey across the ocean.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 11
programme.desc: Dad agrees to play Sheepdog with Bluey and Bingo to stop them from disturbing Mum who is taking a well-earned rest, but looking after a sheep is harder work than they expected.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 10
programme.desc: Dad tries to teach Bluey how to play chess, but Mum thinks she is still too young. When Bingo joins in, the kids make up their own rules, but they still can't beat Dad.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 11
programme.desc: The Squirrels find Duggee's cheerleader pompoms, so he shows them his old moves. Time to practice: Duggee at the chess board, the Squirrels as a squad. There's a big match ahead...

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 10
programme.desc: Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: At Squirrel Club, Detective Puppy solves the mystery of a missing biscuit, the Rabbits tell us what's cool, and the Squirrels help Delivery Chipmunk with a huge parcel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are off to see the Geysers in Iceland, but Grandmaster Glitch and the Grimbots have beaten them to it, and managed to get themselves stuck in the Geysers.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 13
programme.desc: When Bingo stops playing Bluey's spy game, their grown-up controlling device stops working properly! Bluey now sees how important Bingo is and needs to win her back!

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 16
programme.desc: Jack is the new dog at school and the newest recruit in Rusty's Army. Jack struggles with following instructions and always forgets his hat, but Rusty will make a soldier of him yet.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 10
programme.desc: In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to Australia on a baby animal mission to solve the mystery of why a group of kangaroos, and their joeys, are living on a beach. Along the way, Andy is chased by a pack of dingoes and hops to safety with the baby kangaroos.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S1) - EP 5
programme.desc: Disability assistance dog Tinks is determined to help her owner Charli feel confident enough to go to a party.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar drive through the baboons' enclosure and say hello to some very mischievous residents. They then meet the giant river otters at feeding time.

programme.title: Playtime Towers (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: Bella and Lift visit the Fortress of Fun, where Kingsley and Queenie have fun looking for peas with the Playtimers in their Pea Party game.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 28
programme.desc: The Squirrels go on the trail of a lost herd of cattle with Duggee and pal Rodeo Horse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 26
programme.desc: Happy sets his sights on a questionable looking puddle that he is determined to splash in!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 47
programme.desc: The Go Jetters learn about 'symbiosis' - when two different animals or plants help each other.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 46
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are in the Gulf of Mexico to learn about Manatees, peaceful water mammals that spend most of their time either sleeping or eating sea-grass.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 2
programme.desc: When Thomas discovers a missing dog rummaging around the railway yard, he tries to find the dog a new home.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 15
programme.desc: Sarah, Duck and Plate Girl find some unusual inhabitants in the Plant Section at the shop.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 17
programme.desc: The duo think they are heading to the zoo, but the bus takes a surprising diversion.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Myrtle's aunt Cressy is coming to stay, and she needs Stanley to make her a bed for her. This escalates into Stanley building her a whole set of rooms outside Myrtles actual house.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Stanley and the children tour the museum and quickly realise there's nothing about them or their friends, so they make a new exhibit all about their town today!

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 61
programme.desc: Monty investigates how music can make people feel different emotions, after Jeanie tells him that music should have that effect.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: It is a cold Winter afternoon, the trees are bare and the air is frosty. JoJo and Gran Gran wait for Mummy and Daddy to bring back a special visitor from the airport - Great Gran Gran!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 6
programme.desc: When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 7

programme.desc: Mum and Dad vow to only finish their boring housework when the kids stop acting silly, but that's never going to happen, so they end up trying the same approach themselves.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 11
programme.desc: Dad agrees to play Sheepdog with Bluey and Bingo to stop them from disturbing Mum who is taking a well-earned rest, but looking after a sheep is harder work than they expected.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 12
programme.desc: When they're accidentally shut in the shed, Duggee shows the Squirrels how to make the time pass with calm breathing and made-up games. The Squirrels cope so well. Does Duggee?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 11
programme.desc: The Squirrels find Duggee's cheerleader pompoms, so he shows them his old moves. Time to practice: Duggee at the chess board, the Squirrels as a squad. There's a big match ahead...

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Worm and Ladybird wonder what's going on at Squirrel Club. There's a gorilla playing drums, some helpful ducks, a hot frog, four goats and a hospital run by chicken doctors.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 28
programme.desc: Cartoon following four adventure-seeking superheroes as they explore exciting places all around the world.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) - EP 14
programme.desc: Forced to wait five minutes in front of a restaurant for their takeaway, Bluey and Bingo become restless for entertainment, pushing the very limits of Dad's patience.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 17
programme.desc: Bingo and Bluey want mum and dad to smoochy kiss, so they set up a romantic evening for two at their fancy restaurant. Everything goes to plan, until chef Bingo's special arrives.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions (S1) - EP 11
programme.desc: Andy, Jen and Scout head to Malaysia, South East Asia on a baby animal mission to find out why new born dusky leaf monkeys look so different to their parents.

programme.title: Dog Squad (S1) - EP 6
programme.desc: Sylvie the therapy dog helps a little boy called Ben feel brave enough to see the doctor.

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet a flightless bird called a cassowary. Then, they watch the Sunda gharial crocodilian being fed some fish and reveal an amazing connection they have with the cassowary.

programme.title: Playtime Towers (S1) - EP 7
programme.desc: Bella plays funny games with Lift using her colourful towel. Together, they visit Hettie in the Ice Disco, who uses a big towel to make up a new dance - the Butterfly Boogie!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 29
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn what a favourite is, but have trouble deciding their own favourites.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 28
programme.desc: The Squirrels go on the trail of a lost herd of cattle with Duggee and pal Rodeo Horse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 48
programme.desc: The Westman Islands are home to one of the largest colonies of puffins in the world! Once a year puffins return to the land to lay a single egg.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) - EP 47
programme.desc: The Go Jetters learn about 'symbiosis' - when two different animals or plants help each other.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S24) - EP 3
programme.desc: When a Railway Show for little engines comes to Sodor, an overly excited Percy finally sees his chance to shine.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 16
programme.desc: The little girl and her feathery friend have a sleepover with some friends, but struggle to get to nod off.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S2) - EP 18
programme.desc: Sarah suggests visiting the spare sounds section of the Big Shop when Duck loses his quack.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 3
programme.desc: Stanley cleans Cynthia's bus, but each time he does it keeps getting dirty again. It's so dirty by the end, he invents a super-duper cleaning machine that makes a sea of bubbles.

programme.title: Stan Can (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Myrtle's aunt Cressy is coming to stay, and she needs Stanley to make her a bed for her. This escalates into Stanley building her a whole set of rooms outside Myrtles actual house.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 62
programme.desc: Monty is picked on at school for keeping his cuddly toys, and thinks he may be too old for them. This leads him to think about whether people can ever be too old to play.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran get caught in the rain at the park and shelter under the bandstand. JoJo spots a rainbow and discovers that rainbows are only visible when it's rainy and sunny at the same time.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 7
programme.desc: Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 8
programme.desc: Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 9
programme.desc: Bluey teaches Bingo how to use magic so she can make Mum play with her, but she forgets to explain the most important rule: never use magic for cheekiness.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 6
programme.desc: When the Squirrels can't figure out if fish have noses, Duggee shows them his library. But when the Squirrels realise no-one is visiting it, they have an idea...

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 5
programme.desc: Happy has always loved the water. But while swimming around in his paddling pool at the playhouse, Duggee reminds the Squirrels that there was a time when Happy feared water!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 32
programme.desc: Kyan is completing his 'GoJet Academy' high-wire training, above the Grand Canyon, but he's not the only wire-walker out there...

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 2
programme.desc: Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, it's Strawberry, who used to be insecure, but now can't wait to celebrate herself and sing her song, See the Seeds!

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Live from the Roots & Fruits Theatre, it's the speedy dancing runner beans!

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 29

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 30

programme.desc: Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 - EP 221
programme.desc: Rubble & Crew work together to transform Builder Cove's beach boardwalk into a bright, festive winter wonderland. // When a snow day gets in the way of Motor & Mix's Super Squirrely Whirly plans, Rubble & Crew do what they do best... build!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S2 - EP 222
programme.desc: Builder Cove gets its first hotel when Farmer Zoe's cousin Hadley comes to visit. But will Hadley approve of the new hotel?// After a hiking trail mix-up confuses everyone going to Mr. Ducky-Doo's birthday party, the pups help them get back on track.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 - EP 802
programme.desc: Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S10 - EP 1022
programme.desc: Alex dreams that his Mini Patrol animals can talk as they take the Bookmobile on a wild adventure! // Mayor Humdinger steals "The History of Adventure Bay," the book falls apart, and It's up to the Paw Patrol to retrieve it.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 - EP 216
programme.desc: The Barbababies are bored, the rain is preventing them from playing outside. // Barbibul has created a clever decoder capable of translating the cries of animals.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 - EP 212
programme.desc: Barbabravo, Barbalala and Barbabeau are fed up with their brothers and sisters laughing at their expense.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 - EP 105
programme.desc: Tim, Tommy & Tia find a lost toy and vow to return it to its owner. // Kai is super excited to ride the Nebulator, but Tim isn't so sure. // Tim and Kai try to photograph the illusive SpaceBug.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S3 - EP 307
programme.desc: When Motor needs help at the fire station, a new Fire Captain comes to town to help train all the pups as new firefighter recruits. // Charger can't wait to help Sierra Sparkle with her big show! Well, until his hurt paw causes a cone complication.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 - EP 104
programme.desc: After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials.

programme.title: DORA S4 - EP 410
programme.desc: Dora stops a frantic octopus Swiper and saves the Pearl Day Party! // Dora meets Raquel the Rock Lobster and helps her get the missing instruments back in time to play at the big music show!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S9 - EP 902
programme.desc: Blaze is racing in the Pit Stop Power Race with AJ and Gabby as his pit crew! But Crusher is also in the race, and with his Pickle Pit Crew he's determined to win. Will Blaze take home the trophy, or will Crusher pit-stop Blaze in his tracks?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 - EP 104
programme.desc: Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 - EP 119
programme.desc: Barbapapa tells his children about his adventurous youth... and how during a trip on the ice floe, he met Father Christmas. // When he sees the barbababies wasting water, Barbapapa takes them aside to tell them a funny story.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S1 - EP 108
programme.desc: Tim tries to be at two parties at once. // Tim tries to find a bogweed free snack for Kai. // After losing again and again, Tia tries to win every party game.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 - EP 1114
programme.desc: At a Christmas Eve sleepover the Jr. Patrollers are fooled into helping Mayor Humdinger steal everyone's stockings so he can get all the presents.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 - EP 826
programme.desc: The Pups rescue Francois from a water tower geyser. // The Pups rescue a baby anteater stuck on a bucking RoboHorse.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 - EP 106
programme.desc: The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 - EP 107
programme.desc: When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 - EP 821
programme.desc: A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 - EP 822
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 - EP 823
programme.desc: The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 - EP 110
programme.desc: A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 - EP 109
programme.desc: Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: A PAW Patrol Christmas Special
programme.desc: Rubble can't wait for Christmas to come as he's looking forward to Santa bringing him a Lazer Drill. But when Mayor Humdinger learns that Santa has come down with a cold, he decides on taking all of the gifts for himself.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 - EP 214
programme.desc: On a trip to Paris, the Barbapapa family will discover the most incredible museum: the Louvre! // Barbalala has decided to respect all the rules of the day of opposites.

programme.title: Tim Rex in Space S2 - EP 201
programme.desc: Tim explores Rumbleton to find somewhere he can have fun alone. // Tim and Kai try to give Parky the best day ever. // When a storm keeps the Rexes at home they must think of a game to pass the time.

programme.title: DORA S4 - EP 410
programme.desc: Dora stops a frantic octopus Swiper and saves the Pearl Day Party! // Dora meets Raquel the Rock Lobster and helps her get the missing instruments back in time to play at the big music show!

programme.title: DORA S4 - EP 409
programme.desc: Dora and Boots become mermaids and help Marisol the Mermaid save her home, Sirena Sea! // Dora and Boots go across the sea to help their dolphin friend find the best gift ever, a magic jewel!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 - EP 317
programme.desc: When William and Chucks both want the same toy, they compete to see who can hold onto it the longest. // Chucks is great at giving out new nicknames, but Baby likes the name he has already.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 205
programme.desc: It's nearly time for bed and Peppa and George are called in for their bath. After that, they brush their teeth and get into bed. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy and Daddy Pig finally sit down, but it's been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 206
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 207
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 208
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zoe Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When it's home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 209
programme.desc: There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 210
programme.desc: George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 211
programme.desc: Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebecca's paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S2 - EP 249
programme.desc: One day all the lights suddenly go out and Peppa's house is plunged into darkness. There has been a power cut. While they wait for the electricity to come on again, Peppa and George have fun looking for a torch and thinking of games to play.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: Alex and Eugene find themselves at odds with Tom and their fellow dragon riders when Feathers and Webmaster go missing during a blizzard in the Ice Realm.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: Jun struggles to convince Tom to trust her faith in myths over the Book of Dragons when they venture to a place that his book seems to say is extremely dangerous.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 28
programme.desc: Stuck in separate camps, Harold and George unleash a hyperintelligent talking possum to scare the pants off of Krupp. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 29
programme.desc: Eager to get the campers out of his hair, Krupp orders them to climb Plummet Peak, where a terrifying creature is rumored to reside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants S2 - EP 30
programme.desc: Harold and George don't ask for much -- just a fun scavenger hunt that doesn't include doing Krupp's errands. Careful what you wish for, fellas.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 11
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 12
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores (Cakey's Bakery, Baby Box's Craft Emporium, Kitty Fairy's Flower Shoppe) to earn kitty coins and save up for a melodicat at the Grand Opening of DJ Catnips Music Store!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover. They help her conquer her fears and enjoy her first sleepover.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes two little containers of popcorn and two movie tickets, its movie night in the dollhouse! Demanding Director CatRat leads the Gabby Cats through a Gabby-fied version of a classic story, Gabby-locks and the Three Bears.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: Pete the Polar Bear shows up for a vacation on MerCats sunny beach. Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats show Pete he can have a great vacation, even if things dont go precisely to plan.

programme.title: Dinotrux S2 - EP 42
programme.desc: When the crew gets stuck on a sheet of thin ice, they run into a group of Picktools, which appear to be trying to crack the ice around them.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: Zebby is upset when Raa Raa laughs at her rumbling tummy and runs off to hide. Raa Raa sets out to find his friend and apologise he thinks it will be easy, he just has to listen out for the sound of her tummy, but who knew how many other rumbling noises there were?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 14
programme.desc: Raa Raa is inspired by his friends to search for his favourite noise in the jingly jangly jungle. The little lion cub and his friends set out to find out what Raa Raa's Favourite Noise could be

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: Raa Raa and the other animals keep slipping up on banana skins that are littering the jungle floor. Where could they have come from? Together the animals clear up the mess and discover who has been littering the jungle with banana skins.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 16
programme.desc: It is nap time in the Jingly Jangly Jungle but Raa Raa is not tired and is determined to play hide and seek with his friends, whether they like it or not! But all this running about can be tiring work for a noisy little lion cub

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 17
programme.desc: It is raining in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is annoyed as he doesn't think he'll be able to play with his friends until they discover that the rain makes lots of exciting new noises.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 18
programme.desc: Raa Raa and Crocky inadvertently leave one of the others out of all their games. Will they realise that sometimes games can be more fun the more players you have?

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Dak's lack of planning gets him, Cutter and Winger lost with Elbone in the Maze Caves, and Leyla's overthinking threatens the effort to rescue them.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Tag and Scooch team up to get all of Scooch's chores done in time for the Barkapellas Bark In the Park In the Dark concert. \ Tag is so excited to join the Sam Whippets Race Cadets. But when Tag and Scooch show up at the racetrack, theres lots of competition. And to complete the first challenge - a pedal car race - theyre going to have to work together.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 23
programme.desc: The dollhouse is immersed in imaginative Wild West play with Sheriff Gabby, Sheriff Pandy, and CatRat the Bandit. Sheriff Gabby and Sheriff Pandy must safely deliver gold to the bank, but it gets confiscated by Bandit CatRat! They go on an adventure to get the gold back and restore order in the dollhouse.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 24
programme.desc: Gabby brings DJ Catnip a microphone for him to use in the big music show, but he has some terrible news: he lost his groove! Determined to help him get his groove back, Gabby and Pandy take him on a musical search through the dollhouse. As they go, Gabby uses the microphone to record sounds from the Gabby Cats everyday activities that culminate into a new song that gets DJ his groove back just in time for the show! In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, Gabby sings a song!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 - EP 25
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a recipe for dandelion soup and a soup bowl, she discovers Kitty Fairy is sick! Gabby and Pandy make her some delicious dandelion soup and while she rests, they take care of her Garden. With the help of all the Gabby Cats, they water the Singing Flowers, help the Rainbow Kitty Bushes regain their color, and sing some fussy Itty Bitty Blossoms a lullaby. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 51
programme.desc: After the events of the Boss Baby 2 film, adult businessman Theodore Templeton is framed for embezzling from his company and forced to revert back to his old Boss Baby self and crash with his brother Tim. But to pull this off, he'll need to win over Tim's family into letting him stay, and convince Baby Corp to give him back his old job... which is currently held by his baby niece Tina.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 52
programme.desc: Tina and Boss adjust to co-boss responsibilities while on a mission to rescue the baby with the best hair in the world from a lice outbreak. With opposing leadership views, the two split the existing field team's focus and discover a new archenemy in Lumpy the Park Duck.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 53
programme.desc: After a baby says a swear word on live television (censored by child-friendly online filter Sheriff Potty Pardner), Boss becomes obsessed with proving that the baby was taught this filth by their new arch-nemesis, Lumpy the Park Duck. Meanwhile, Tina's search to find what that swear word means creates unintentional havoc for both Tabitha's research paper and for Baby Corp's online systems when Sheriff Potty Pardner gives them an "internet time out"

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 54
programme.desc: After Boss insults Tina's imaginary friend, he's forced into "Imaginary Friend Sensitivity Training" at Baby Corp. Boss makes up his own imaginary friend to get out of these meetings, but after Tina gets a whiff that he may be lying, he's forced to keep up the charade at work and at home.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 55
programme.desc: It's a turf war when Bounce House Bruiser Baby encroaches on Delivery Baby's tricycle park! Tina attempts to befriend Bruiser in order to woo her back to the bounce house, but naughty behavior is the only language Bruiser understands. Determined to win this kid over, Tina ends up going rogue as a trike hoodlum, and her own field team is forced to reign her in.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 56
programme.desc: Boss takes an overdue vacation day, and ends up teaching Tabitha the value of "trading up" valueless objects into something she actually wants, an electric scooter. However, a 5%er baby is in trouble and BB's field team has "got it under control" or do they? Boss tries to juggle his Tabitha lessons with sneaking peeks at the mission in progress

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 57
programme.desc: Boss searches for evidence that Tabitha's best friend is an Uncuddleable, but is sidetracked by a Templeton Family tradition: "The War of the Cheeks", a Go Fish tournament where the winner gets to make family rules for a whole day. When Yvette joins in, Boss has to keep her from winning, out of fear that an evil babysitter will make family rules that overturn the Templeton household.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 58
programme.desc: Trying to win Tabitha's loyalty for Baby Corp, Boss and Tina invite her to Techy Tykes, a technology convention at their office. But when the top-secret UBO goes missing, the outsiders Tabitha and Tim (who's tagged along to relive his glory days) immediately become the number one suspects.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 59
programme.desc: Missing his old life on his birthday, Boss tries to have a full-fledged grown-up celebration in Chicago, but Carol is the only one able to chauffeur and take care of him. The two battle at every stop of the birthday party tour, but when Boss's old work nemesis sets him up for an Federal Investigation Sting at an improv comedy show, Boss and Carol are forced to work together to escape the law.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 60
programme.desc: Boss, Tina, JJ, Dez and Pip willfully get babysat by the Uncuddleables, planning to expose them as horrible sitters via secret, hidden cameras. But the plan is thrown for a loop when Tina's first night alone without her parents makes her fall for their sitter Mia as a "substitute mommy." Meanwhile, Nannycam uses the babysitting distraction to sneak into the Uncuddleables' secret garage hideout to gather intel with her own "B field team."

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 61
programme.desc: The Uncuddleables have struck the Lil Dumpling baby pageant, replacing all of Baby Corp's super-cute top 5%er babies with not-cute bottom 5%ers. Boss, Tina and their field team race to caravan the 5%ers from their homes to the pageant before Nannycam deploys the nuclear option of unleashing the dangerously cute UBO on stage to salvage a Lil Dumpling win.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 62
programme.desc: Boss Baby and Tina reject the 5%er system that says the cuter you are, the more love you deserve. Teaming up with the Uncuddleables, the team tries to take down the system from within, forming a resistance of the eight department heads of Baby Corp in the hopes of changing the way we look at Baby Love forever.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 63
programme.desc: Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the towns faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 64
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 65
programme.desc: Lured into an empty hotel where a baby has supposedly gone missing, the team is trapped by Crispin Biscuits, a chaotic British schoolboy baby whos been hired to wreck Boss and Tinas lives. Crispin puts the new companys loyalty to a test in a series of fiendish puzzling mind games, all with the threat of constant balloon popping (horrible for baby ears!)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 66
programme.desc: Our teams startup company and their rivals at Baby Corp get in a "Space Race", competing to see who can make the cutest kiddie-pretend "moon landing" for a baby - a spectacle sure to bring in a bounty of Baby Love. With both companies pouring their resources into a simulated space take off, tempers and sabotage are running hot, and the scrappy little startup is in danger of getting crushed by their big business competitor.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 67
programme.desc: JJ reluctantly lets Tina take over her assistant duties for the day, but a Tina slip-up leads to an outbreak of town adults drinking diluted special formula that makes them all baby-brained. When JJ discovers this, she works with R & D Baby Simmons and Security Baby Katja to antidote the wobbling "Adult Babies" before Tina can find out and blame herself.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 68
programme.desc: Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tinas startup company for exploding baby Iggys favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corps current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib S3 - EP 69
programme.desc: On the hottest week of the year and a miserable time for babies, Boss and Tim infiltrates a country club with a very cool splash pad in order to find some way around their strict "no-babies" policy. Meanwhile, Banker Baby Benny visits the startup company to check on his investment. Tina has to cover up how the heat has split her coworkers into lawless factions fighting over a fan and a mist cooler.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 - EP 37
programme.desc: A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 - EP 38
programme.desc: Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business S2 - EP 39

programme.desc: A group of Trux displaced by a volcano comes to Ty for help, and the gang has to work together to build a bridge to welcome their new guests.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 19
programme.desc: Raa Raa and all his friends are finding out about different animals, they charge around being a pride of lions, a tower of giraffes etc until Zebby wonders what zebras do together the animals discover that zebras stampede which is great fun and very noisy!
